proCTA.helpvalue:
Upgrade to Snow Pro to customize the snow simulation.

  • Set a timer to only show snow effect during the holidays or any dates of your choosing.
  • Set the intensity of the snow storm from “Light” all the way to “Blizzard”.
  • Adjust the wind conditions.
  • Set the snow color to perfectly match your site’s style.

Snow Pro costs $1 per year but is free for a limited time if you send a tweet about Snow Pro to you followers.

Try Snow Pro instead
